## objective 

1. Create a web page presentation using R Markdown 
2. feature a plot created with Plotly. 
3. Host your webpage on either GitHub Pages, RPubs, or NeoCities. 
4. webpage must contain the date for the created document, and it must contain a plot created with Plotly.

## the code
load the libirary and the data and plot 
```{r ,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(mtcars, x=~mpg, y=~disp, mode="markers")
```
